Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 87th overall pick, by Manchester in 1972...
Injured on 4/23/1972 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 7/6/1972 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Manchester on 11/3/1976...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 11/3/1976 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/1977, off Anthony Hawks (PIT)...
Injured on 4/29/1980 with a Broken Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1982, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1984, hitting .474 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1984...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/8/1986 to a 1-year deal worth $310,000 per year...
